case_title: MUSA KHAN SILACHI vs PROVINCE OF BALUCHISTAN AND ANOTHER

transfer_details: Transferred to Federal Government as Deputy Director, F.I.A., Quetta on 1975-07-11
Posted as Assistant Director, Intelligence, Quetta on 1975-12-15
Transferred back to Provincial Government as Officer on Special Duty on 1976-01-07

allegations: Running a bus in the name of his father
Misconduct under Government Servants (Efficiency and Discipline) Rules of 1973

key_points.legal_issue: Jurisdiction of the tribunal to entertain the appeal based on whether the appellant was a provincial or federal civil servant.

tribunal_decision.finding: Appellant was a provincial civil servant.
tribunal_decision.action: Retirement order by the President of Pakistan declared ultra vires and set aside.

legal_references: Government Servants (Efficiency and Discipline) Rules of 1973
Constitution of Pakistan, Article 240 and Article 260(1)
Police Service of Pakistan (Composition and Cadre) Rules, 1969
